name: GitHub User Events
description: Fetch public activity events for a specified GitHub user, including pushes, forks, stars, issues, PRs, and more. Supports token authentication for higher API call limits.
author: Sidefy Team

filterSelf.description: Filter out own events (true/false, default: false)

discontinued_reason: Due to inherent high latency issues with GitHub's official API, user activity event data updates are not timely, often delayed by hours or longer. This prevents the plugin from providing real-time accurate user activity information, severely impacting user experience. Additionally, GitHub's API call limits are strict, and frequent requests may trigger rate limiting. Given these API-level technical limitations, we have decided to discontinue maintenance of this plugin.
